name: Llama Life
description:
Llama life is a simulator where llamas start on a small island and live out their lives. On this island, life is played by the beat. Llamas only do something on each beat of the music. (They do be groovin tho) Earn money every 4 beats that can make the llamas lives a little bit easier! Each island is procedural generated, so life is a little different each time you play. Have fun watching the llamas!

My Youtube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC4UAbwMZQdi0UyGTORL6zPw
